text: Friedrich-Wilhelm von Herrmann (8 October 1934 - 2 August 2022) was a German philosopher. He was known for his works about Martin Heidegger's thought. Herrmann was born in Potsdam, Germany. He also worked at the University of Freiburg. Herrmann died on 2 August 2022 of a heart attack in Freiburg im Breisgau, Germany at the age of 87.La morte di Friedrich-Wilhelm von Herrmann ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German philosophers Category:German academics Category:People from Potsdam Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Friedrich-Wilhelm von Herrmann
